meanings.definition: A person who covers walls or other surfaces with wallpaper.
meanings.sent1: The paperers did a great job decorating the room with colorful wallpaper.
meanings.sent2: The paperers were hired to put up new wallpaper in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The paperers joked that they were experts in making walls look pretty.
meanings.sent4: The paperers transformed the plain walls into a vibrant work of art.
meanings.sent5: The paperers skillfully applied the wallpaper, turning the room into a cozy space.

meanings.definition: A person who writes or publishes articles in a newspaper.
meanings.sent1: The paperers at the local newspaper always meet their deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The paperers reported on the latest events in the city.
meanings.sent3: The paperers shared exciting news stories with the community.
meanings.sent4: The paperers' words in the newspaper painted a vivid picture of the world.
meanings.sent5: The paperers' articles were filled with interesting facts and stories.

meanings.definition: A person who prepares or processes paperwork.
meanings.sent1: The paperers organized the documents in neat folders.
meanings.sent2: The paperers ensured all the paperwork was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The paperers playfully juggled the stacks of paperwork on their desk.
meanings.sent4: The paperers' efficiency in handling paperwork impressed their colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The paperers meticulously checked each form for accuracy before filing them.
